Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.konnect.User
public class User extends Object
This class represents a User object with various properties and methods.

Jayson Acosta

    • toastError

      public static void toastError(android.content.Context context, int errorCode, String error)
      Displays a toast message based on the provided error code and logs the error message.
      Parameters:
      context - The context in which the toast message will be displayed.
      errorCode - The error code indicating the type of error. 0 is a login error and 1 is a server error.
      error - The error message to be logged.
